To serve: 1 slice crusty bread, toasted and drizzled with oil
default: 100g/3½oz rump steak, trimmed and very finely chopped

steps: Place the chopped steak into a mixing bowl. Add all the remaining ingredients except the egg yolk and toast and mix well.
Place a chefs' ring onto a serving plate and fill with the steak mixture.
To serve, remove the chefs' ring, top with the egg yolk and serve with toast.
title: Steak tartare with toast
